downloadTitle: Estimate Performance and Capacity Requirements for Microsoft Project Server 2010
downloadDescription: Guidance on the footprint that using Project Server 2010 has on topologies that are running SharePoint Server 2010

downloadFile.name: Estimate Performance and Capacity Requirements for Microsoft Project Server 2010.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/4/e/34e51eed-ac63-44c3-995e-57ce2c0f9051/Estimate Performance and Capacity Requirements for Microsoft Project Server 2010.docx

detailsSection: This performance and capacity planning document provides guidance on the footprint that usage of Microsoft Project Server 2010 has on topologies that are running Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010.
detailsSection_file_name: Estimate Performance and Capacity Requirements for Microsoft Project Server 2010.docx
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this paper, you must have Microsoft Office Word 2007 or 2010. You can also use Office Word 2003 or Word XP and the Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
